name: UIDevice.BatteryState
desc: Constants that describe the battery power state of the device.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The battery state for the device cannot be determined.

items.name: case unplugged
items.desc: The device is not plugged into power; the battery is discharging.

items.name: case charging
items.desc: The device is plugged into power and the battery is less than 100% charged.

items.name: case full
items.desc: The device is plugged into power and the battery is 100% charged.
